articles.author: Brian Logan
articles.title: Script, what script? Why Parks and Recreation star Ben Schwartz can't quit improv - The Guardian
articles.description: The beloved sitcom’s scene-stealer may now be hot Hollywood property, starring alongside Jim Carrey and Nicolas Cage, but he refuses to move on from his first love. As he scores a Netflix special and heads for the UK, he explains its allure
articles.content: Plenty of Hollywood stars started out in improv: Amy Poehler, Bill Murray, Mike Myers they all got noticed on the improv stage then moved on to loftier things. What makes Ben Schwartz different is th… [+4807 chars]

articles.title: Thomas Bangalter explains the real reason for Daft Punk's split - Mixmag
articles.description: The French producer spoke to the BBC about the pair parting ways in 2021
articles.content:
Thomas Bangalter, one of two founding members of Daft Punk, has spoken on the real reason for the duos split in 2021.
